SELECT t2.commission, t2.perId, t2.phone, t2.type, t2.tracking_status, t2.creation_date, co.meaning trackingStatus FROM ( SELECT SUM( t1.commission_amount ) commission, t1.per_id perId, t1.phone phone, t1.device type, t1.creation_date, MAX( t1.tracking_status ) tracking_status FROM ( SELECT t.id, t.per_id, t.phone, t.device, t.tracking_status, t.commission_amount, t.creation_date FROM commission_order t WHERE t.inviter_level_1 = #{personId} AND t.inviter_level = 1
) t1 GROUP BY t1.per_id ) t2 LEFT JOIN c_code_value co ON t2.tracking_status = co.code_code AND co.code_type = 'commission_rule_tracking_status'
WHERE t2.phone like CONCAT('',#{phone},'%')
ORDER BY t2.creation_date DESC
